main event: A man traveling in a car saw a luminous object passing overhead in Paraná, Argentina on July 26, 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as circular, glowing bluish-white, and emitting a beam of light that illuminated the ground in a bluish-green color., The object was estimated to be about 15 to 20 feet in diameter., The witness estimated the speed of the object to be several times faster than conventional aircraft., The sighting lasted about 3 to 4 minutes before the object disappeared at high speed., Other witnesses confirmed the man's description of the sighting.
sighted object: a luminous circular object in the sky
witness description: a man traveling in a car and several other persons who also observed the object
